short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add functionality to the when2meet scheduling site, allowing users to see individual and combinations of schedules more easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that provides clearer ways to see schedules on the popular when2meet scheduling site by allowing users to see individual people's schedules, as well as combinations of people.
